publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1325 Margaret Mitchell: Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division-That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Academical Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish Football League First Division and acknowledges the efforts of the players, coaches and management in securing the promotion.
S2M-1325 Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division (lodged on 17 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1325 Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division (lodged on 17 May 2004) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Murdo Fraser*, Michael McMahon*, Bill Butler*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Linda Fabiani*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Johnstone*

S2M-1325 Margaret Mitchell: Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division-That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Academical Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish Football League First Division and acknowledges the efforts of the players, coaches and management in securing the promotion. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Murdo Fraser, Michael McMahon, Bill Butler, Mr Brian Monteith, Linda Fabiani, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Michael Matheson, Alex Johnstone, Mr David Davidson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Colin Fox*
S2M-1325 Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division (lodged on 17 May 2004) Brian Adam*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1325 Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division (lodged on 17 May 2004) Karen Gillon*, Alex Neil*
S2M-1325 Hamilton Football Club Promotion to First Division (lodged on 17 May 2004) Scott Barrie*
